00023    /*
00024    * Constructor.
00025    */
00026    McStressAutoCorr::McStressAutoCorr(McSystem& system) 
00027     : SystemDiagnostic<McSystem>(system),
00028       outputFile_(),
00029       accumulator_(),
00030       capacity_(-1),
00031       isInitialized_(false)
00032    {}
00033 
00034    /*
00035    * Read parameters from file, and allocate data array.
00036    */
00037    void McStressAutoCorr::readParam(std::istream& in) 
00038    {
00039 
00040       // Read interval and parameters for AutoCorrArray
00041       readInterval(in);
00042       readOutputFileName(in);
00043       read<int>(in, "capacity", capacity_);
00044 
00045       // Validate input
00046       if (capacity_ <= 0)        
00047          UTIL_THROW("Negative capacity");
00048 
00049       // Allocate memory for the AutoCorrArray accumulator object
00050       accumulator_.setParam(capacity_);
00051 
00052       isInitialized_ = true;
00053    }
00054 
00055 
00056    /*
00057    * Set actual number of molecules and clear accumulator.
00058    */
00059    void McStressAutoCorr::setup()
00060    {
00061       accumulator_.clear();
00062    }
00063 
00064    /*
00065    * Evaluate shear stress autocorrelation function.
00066    */
00067    void McStressAutoCorr::sample(long iStep) 
00068    { 
00069       if (isAtInterval(iStep))  {
00070          Tensor stress;
00071          system().computeStress(stress);
00072          double pressure = stress.trace()/double(Dimension);
00073          for (int i = 0; i < Dimension; ++i) {
00074             stress(i, i) -= pressure;
00075          }
00076          stress.symmetrize();
00077          double volume = system().boundary().volume();
00078          stress *= sqrt(volume);
00079          accumulator_.sample(stress);
00080       } 
00081    }
00082 
00083    /*
00084    * Output results to file after simulation is completed.
00085    */
00086    void McStressAutoCorr::output() 
00087    {  
00088       // Echo parameters to log file
00089       fileMaster().openOutputFile(outputFileName(), outputFile_);
00090       writeParam(outputFile_); 
00091       outputFile_ << std::endl;
00092       outputFile_ << "bufferCapacity  " << accumulator_.bufferCapacity() << std::endl;
00093       outputFile_ << "nSample         " << accumulator_.nSample() << std::endl;
00094       outputFile_ << std::endl;
00095       outputFile_ << "average   " << accumulator_.average() << std::endl;
00096       outputFile_ << std::endl;
00097       outputFile_ << "Format of *.dat file" << std::endl;
00098       outputFile_ << "[int time in samples]  [double autocorrelation function]" 
00099                   << std::endl;
00100       outputFile_ << std::endl;
00101       outputFile_.close();
00102 
00103       // Write autocorrelation function to data file
00104       fileMaster().openOutputFile(outputFileName(".dat"), outputFile_);
00105       accumulator_.output(outputFile_); 
00106       outputFile_.close();
00107    }
00108

00112    void McStressAutoCorr::save(Serializable::OArchiveType& ar)
00113    { ar & *this; }

00118    void McStressAutoCorr::load(Serializable::IArchiveType& ar)
00119    { ar & *this; }
